books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A Texas Ranger fights for custody of his daughter amid complications stemming from his attraction to the judge.
books.name: FRICTION

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Harper Lee
books.description: In the mid-1950s, a grown-up Jean Louise Finch returns to Maycomb and realizes that her adored father is a racist.
books.name: GO SET A WATCHMAN

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: In an e-book short story set in 1989, Jack Reacher must solve the murder of a young officer.
books.name: SMALL WARS

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: A Los Angeles psychotherapist is surprised when a brief hookup shows up as a patient — and even more surprised when he is murdered.
books.name: THE MURDERER'S DAUGHTER

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and litigates against the coal-mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A sequel, told from Christian’s point of view, revisits the tortured romance between the controlling billionaire and the unassuming Ana.
books.name: GREY

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett and the F.B.I.’s Emily Parker must save New York City from a deadly threat.
books.name: ALERT

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by J.S. Cooper
books.description: A sexy millionaire asks a friend’s sister to participate in a fake engagement.
books.name: FOUR WEEK FIANCÉ

books.author: by Jennifer Weiner
books.description: Andy and Rachel meet as children, then come together and separate repeatedly over the years.
books.name: WHO DO YOU LOVE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: Paul Martinez and Hope, the nurse he hired to help his mother, begin to fall in love; McCarthys of Gansett Island, Book 13.
books.name: LOVE AFTER DARK

books.author: by Paula McLain
books.description: A novel by the author of “The Paris Wife” about Beryl Markham, a horse trainer and aviatrix raised in Kenya.
books.name: CIRCLING THE SUN
